caption:
In this photograph, a man is engaging in gardening activities, specifically attending to a bush with bright pink flowers, likely azaleas. The man, wearing a brown jacket with a name badge and a dark hat, is using a long-handled tool, possibly a hoe, to cultivate or weed around the plant. His posture is bent forward slightly, focusing intently on his task.

The setting is an outdoor space with green grass, suggesting a private garden or a park. In the background, there are scattered trees with moderate foliage and what appears to be a white, metallic garden fence, beyond which there is a more densely wooded area. The setting conveys a peaceful, natural environment, typical of a well-maintained outdoor space.

Visible in the background to the side is part of what looks like playground equipment, indicating that this area might be close to a public park or a residential area that accommodates families. The sky is bright and clear, suggesting a sunny day, which enhances the vividness of the green and pink hues in the foreground.
title: This Montz homeowner is digging up plants before his property is taken over by the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers for construction of a new Mississippi River setback levee.
